meanings: 실용회화-직장을 구할 때 Good jobs are hard to find.
be as easy as flipping one's palm

vlive.korean: 쉽지? So easy, right? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 넌 사랑의 끝이 결혼이라고 생각하니? [넘버식스] ep.2
어렵나 이거? 뭐가 쉽지? Is it difficult? What's the easy one? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [PARK JI HOON] 크레이지 방귀케이드 왕초보뉴비먕먕,, 내 물풍선에 저장😉💦 (JI HOON playing the game with MAY)
vlive.english: Is it difficult? What's the easy one?

vlive.korean: [정복은 쉽지 않은 법...] 사람이 아주... [But it's not easy to have fun] There's a long queue. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 리노 : 리노, 하고 싶은 거 다 하지 마
vlive.english: [But it's not easy to have fun] There's a long queue.

vlive.korean: [쉽지 않군] 2, 3, 4, 5... [Not easy] 2, 3, 4, 5... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
쉽지 않아 그거 좋아! That's not easy, that was good! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : First Atlanta show UNLOCKED ❤😁
vlive.english: That's not easy, that was good!

examples.korean: The problem is anything but easy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 문제가 결코 쉽지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The problem is anything but easy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This time round it was not so easy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이번에는 그것이 그렇게 쉽지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This time round it was not so easy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: That score is going to take some beating. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저 점수는 넘어서기 쉽지 않을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That score is going to take some beating. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There is a fine line between showing interest in what someone is doing and interfering in it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 누군가가 하고 있는 일에 대해 관심을 보이는 것과 그것을 간섭하는 것 사이는 구분이 쉽지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is a fine line between showing interest in what someone is doing and interfering in it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘It won’t be easy,’ he said grimly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그것은 쉽지 않을 거야.” 그가 단호하게 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘It won’t be easy,’ he said grimly. Add to Wordbook
